metadata.title: CVE-2023-41993 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOSSonoma 14. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploitedagainst versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41993` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.42.1-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.42.1-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.42.1-2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.42.1-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.42.1-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.42.1-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.42.1-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.42.1-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.1-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.42.1-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.42.1-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.1-2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.42.1-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.42.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.42.1-2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
